text: Martin Beiser (born March 4, 1971 in Oberstdorf) is a former German curler and curling coach. He is a former German men's curling champion (1992).Curling - Deutsche Meisterschaften ==Awards and honours== * All-Star Team, Men: . ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip !
